thread.title: Windows 10 Launch Draws Crowds to Microsoft Tysons Store
thread.title_full: Windows 10 Launch Draws Crowds to Microsoft Tysons Store

author: Shashi Bellamkonda, DC Social Media Marketing Examiner
title: Windows 10 Launch Draws Crowds to Microsoft Tysons Store
text:
Windows 10 Launch Draws Crowds to Microsoft Tysons Store Use your key for the next article Young visitors to the Tysons Corner Microsoft Store enjoy the Kinect display Shashi Bellamkonda View all 5 photos 
This week Microsoft launched Windows 10 . This is the new Microsoft. Instead of selling CDs and making this a huge commercial deal, Microsoft now offers a lot of it's existing customers a FREE upgrade for one year. If you have a laptop running Microsoft, chances are that you got a Windows icon added to your taskbar. Clicking on the task bar helped you reserve your copy of Windows 10 which will be downloaded automatically for you to upgrade at a time of your choice. 
The July 29th launch also had several offline events at Microsoft Stores. I went to to the Tysons Corner Store where they had several activities through out the day The Answer Desk where technicians were on-hand to answer any Windows 10 questions and provide a free upgrade assessment on all devices. · Free Windows 10 Workshops to learn how get the most out of new feature · A Community Reception . to recognize local community organizations and nonprofits which inllcuded House Studio and DaVinci Challenge, among others. · Windows 10 Experience Zones located inside Tysons Corner Center on Level One, near Macy’s from July 29 - Aug. 9, offeringc Windows 10 demo experiences on products like Surface Pro 3, Xbox One and Minecraft. 
On July 29th was very excited to see special guest, World Cup Champion, Ali Krieger who came to the store to meet with fans and celebrate Windows 10 with the community. 
Have you got your Windows 10 upgrade yet? What do you think? My daughter got the upgrade already and loves it. BTW The START button is back.
